comment: Under the assumption ` -. x = y ` the reverse direction of ~ 19.2 is provable from Tarski's FOL and ~ ax13v only. Note that in conjunction with ~ 19.2 in fact ` ( -. x = y -> ( A. x z = y <-> E. x z = y ) ) ` holds. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 17-Apr-2021.)
